name: Aloo Bhujia

name: Dal Mash

name: Chicken Karahi (Boneless)
description: Tender boneless chicken cooked in a wok with tomatoes, green chilies, and special karahi spices.

name: Chicken Haleem
description: A hearty blend of wheat, lentils, and shredded chicken slow-cooked to a porridge-like consistency.

name: Chicken Nihari
description: Slow-cooked chicken in a rich, spiced gravy with bone marrow - a royal delicacy.

name: Beef Nihari
description: Traditional slow-cooked beef stew in a complex blend of spices, garnished with fresh ginger and cilantro.

name: Mutton Paya
description: Slow-cooked goat trotters in a rich, spiced broth - a traditional breakfast delicacy.

name: Beef Paya
description: Beef trotters slow-cooked in a flavorful broth with aromatic spices and fresh herbs.

name: Dum Ka Deema (Beef)

name: Beef Kofta

name: Chicken Handi

name: Aloo Qeema

name: Chicken Steam Tikka

name: Chicken Steam Roast

name: Mutton Karahi
description: Tender mutton pieces cooked with tomatoes and green chilies in a traditional karahi (wok).

name: Mutton Kunna

name: Chicken Yakhni Pulao

name: Mutton Yakhni Pulao
description: Basmati rice cooked in mutton broth with whole spices and tender mutton pieces.

name: Kabuli Pulao

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Layers of fragrant basmati rice and spiced chicken cooked together with saffron and herbs.

name: Egg Fried Rice
description: Wok-fried rice with scrambled eggs, vegetables, and light soy seasoning.

name: Beef Chilli

name: Chicken Chowmein

name: Chicken Manchurian
description: Crispy chicken balls in a tangy, sweet and sour sauce with garlic and ginger.

name: Schezwan Chicken
description: Spicy stir-fried chicken with vegetables in a fiery Sichuan pepper sauce.

name: Alfredo Pasta
description: Fettuccine pasta in a rich, creamy parmesan sauce with garlic and herbs.

description: Layers of pasta, minced beef, tomato sauce, and cheese baked to perfection.

name: Chicken Lasagna (With White Sauce)

name: Chicken Spaghetti

name: Chicken Vegetable Pasta
description: Pasta tossed with sautéed chicken, seasonal vegetables, and herbs in a light sauce.

name: Fajita Pizza
